page.title: 10TINWALD PARISH CHILDS C'TTEE
page.content: Tinwald Parish Childrens' Committee has been running since approximiately 1950. It was set up as a means of raising money in order to treat the children of the Parish to a Hallowe'en Party, a Christmas Party, and a Summer Outing. The latter have included trips to Ae Forest,Butlins,the Magnum Sports Centre (Irvine,Ayrshire ) and the Lowther Wildlife Park.Meetings are held approximately five times a year with an Annual General meeting in September. The committee consists of seven people with Mr.W.Gordon "Windon", Sheildhill Road,Lockerbie as Chairman.
